subprotocols.name: Streams
subprotocols.purpose: Manage bidirectional data streams between peers, including stream creation, prioritization, and data transfer.

subprotocols.name: Flow Control
subprotocols.purpose: Regulate the amount of data that can be sent to prevent overwhelming the receiver.

subprotocols.name: Connection Management
subprotocols.purpose: Handle connection establishment, maintenance, and closure, including error handling.

open_questions.ask: Clarify the role of STREAMS_BLOCKED frame in the context of Streams or Flow Control.
